problem.markdown:
In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the heart?
[[(Motherboard), CPU/Processor, RAM, Video Card, Power Supply, Hard Disk, Optical Drive]]
[explanation] The Motherboard is like the heart of the machine because everything connects to it in some way. [explanation]
problem.p: In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to the heart?

div.p: The Motherboard is like the heart of the machine because everything connects to it in some way.
